name: School Etoile, Olyvia
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, choose up to five of your rear-guards. If all of the chosen rear-guards have different card names, [Stand] all of them. If you [Stand] three or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle. ([Stand] even if only one was chosen)

name: Star on Stage, Plon
effect:
[Melody] (Shares all of your [Melody])
[CONT](VC):During each main phase and each battle phase, this unit gets all of the abilities of all the cards with [Melody] not named "Star on Stage, Plon" in your soul.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a rear-guard with [Melody] into your soul], draw a card, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you get an Imaginary Gift:Force, Accel, or Protect.

name: Happiness Heart, Lupina
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one normal unit from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called, get an Imaginary Gift:Force, and put that marker on the (RC) that unit is on.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] all of your rear-guards on circles with a Force marker.

name: Perfect Performance, Ange
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of normal units on any player's (RC), and return them to hand. Activate all of the effects below according to the number of cards returned.
・2 or more - This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・3 or more - Get an Imaginary Gift:Force.
・4 or more - Search your deck for up to one unit card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: PR♥ISM-Image, Vert
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and bind a card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your (RC) or drop zone. If you bound a card, this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return all of your front row rear-guards to your hand], and call up to one card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your bind zone to (RC). If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you may call up to a total of two cards with "PR♥ISM" in their different card names to (RC) instead of one.

name: Girlish Idol, Lyriquor
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, choose up to two order cards from your drop zone, and return them to your hand.
[AUTO](VC):When any player's unit intercepts, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, if your order was played this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and your opponent's units must intercept as much as possible until end of that battle.

name: Chouchou Debut Stage, Tirua
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, choose any number of normal units on any player's (RC), and return them to hand. If three or more cards were returned, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it attacked, if three or more of any player's rear-guards were returned to hand this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Sweetest Sister, Meer
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, put a Meer's Present marker into your hand.
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, reveal any number of "Meer's Present" from your hand, and all of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card revealed. If you revealed two or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and heal a card from your damage zone.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, call up to one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Clear Appeal, Seredy
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your units, search your deck or drop zone for up to one card with the same card name as that unit, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard attacks, reveal any number of cards from your hand with the same card name as the attacking unit, and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each card revealed.

name: Velvet Voice, Raindear
effect:
[CONT](Deck):While it is revealed by a card's effect, it is regarded as a trigger unit instead of a normal unit.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], reveal ten cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, ride up to one of the revealed cards not named "Velvet Voice, Raindear" as [Stand], shuffle your deck, and that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn. At the end of this turn, put that unit on the bottom of your deck, and ride a grade 3 card from your soul as [Rest].

name: Top Idol, Aqua
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have another unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, return up to one of your other normal units on (RC) to your hand, and if you returned a card, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Mermaid Idol, Sedna
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have another unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Expect Rhythm, Vierra
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:If your vanguard is "Top Idol, Pacifica" or "Expect Rhythm, Vierra", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put another rear-guard on the bottom of your deck], and call up to one normal unit from your drop zone to (RC). Choose all of your rear-guards, and until end of your opponent's next turn, they get "Boost", and cannot be chosen by your opponent's card's abilities.

name: PR♥ISM-Image, Rosa
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to two cards with "PR♥ISM" in their card names from among them, put up to one card into your hand, bind up to one card, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When placed from bind zone, all of your front row units with "PR♥ISM" in their card names get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Bear Affection, Laer
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 3]. If you [Soul-Charge] a card with "Coral" in its card name, draw a card.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Coral" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [Counter-Charge 1], choose all of your rear-guards, and they get "Boost" until end of turn.

name: Sporty Idol, Innes
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with "Riviere" in its card name and the same grade as your vanguard, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 card with "Riviere" in its card name], and this unit and one of your units with "Riviere" in its card name get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: PR♥ISM-Image, Clear
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 2 or greater card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When placed from bind zone, [COST][bind a card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your drop zone], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Mermaid Idol, Elly
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, search your deck for up to one "Mermaid Idol, Elly", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, and this unit is on (RC), retire this unit.
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][put a "Mermaid Idol, Elly" from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Cherished Phrase, Reina
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)

name: Glittery Baby, Lene
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Choco Love Heart, Liselotte
effect:
[CONT](Hand):It can be called as a grade 1. (Can be called to (RC) even when your vanguard is grade 1. Is grade 2 after being placed)
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC) or put it into your soul. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Multiple Shine, Mirada
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, ride up to one grade 2 unit card from among them as [Stand], and shuffle your deck.

name: Unique Allure, Dagny
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if there is a Force marker on this unit's circle, the original [Critical] of the "Happiness Heart, Lupina" on your (VC) becomes 2.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [Soul-Charge 1]. If "Happiness Heart, Lupina" or "Freshers Innovate, Rosalinda" is on your (VC) or (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Customize Service, Maxine
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to two "Lyrical Veil", reveal them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Filling Reverie, Petra
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one "Sweetest Sister, Meer", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, if your card was put from your damage zone into your drop zone this turn, your opponent cannot call sentinels to (GC) from hand until end of that battle.

name: Rainbow Shard, Uranie
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Pacifica" in its card name from among them, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Gleeful Mode, Tavia
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, if "Bermuda Triangle Cadet, Riviere" is in your soul, look at five cards from the top of your deck, put up to one card from among them on the top of your deck, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. (You can activate in any order with "when rode upon" abilities)
[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Riviere" in its card name is placed during the battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Tamed Cadence, Katya
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player's rear-guard was returned to hand this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked or boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Tirua" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and return all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit to your hand.

name: Direct Squirt, Elshe
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Coral" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, put a card from your hand into your soul.

name: Prudent Blue, Miep
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):If your and your opponent's vanguards have the same grade, you may pay "[Soul-Blast 1]" for this ability's cost. When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to a total of two cards with [Melody] and different card names from among them, put up to one card into your hand, put up to one card into your soul, and shuffle your deck.

name: Freshers Innovate, Rosalinda
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if this unit's circle has a Force marker, the "Happiness Heart, Lupina" on your (VC) gets [Power] +10000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Happiness Heart, Lupina" or "Unique Allure, Dagny" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Peppy Smile, Helga
effect:
[CONT](RC):If you revealed a "Meer's Present" from hand this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Lyrical Veil
effect:
[COST][Soul-Blast 2 & Discard a "Lyrical Veil" from your hand]
Choose up to two grade 2 or less unit cards from your drop zone, and call them to (RC). Choose any number of any player's rear-guards, and until end of your opponent's next turn, they get "Intercept", and can intercept from the back row.

name: Consent Select, Beata
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, if you rode a grade 4 this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform one of the effects below.
・This unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
・This unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Rose Princess, Phalaina
effect:
[CONT](RC)/(GC):If any player's unit intercepted this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000. (Including this unit)
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and return up to two "Lyrical Veil" from your drop zone to your hand.

name: Captivating Originality, Gerlinde
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, reveal seven cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, call up to two of the revealed cards to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Perfectionist, Relenca
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, search your deck or drop zone for up to one "Perfectionist, Relenca", reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, [COST][discard two "Perfectionist, Relenca" from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and draw two cards.

name: Cerulean Jewelry, Phaseav
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, search your deck or drop zone for up to one "Cerulean Jewelry, Phaseav", reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, [COST][discard two "Cerulean Jewelry, Phaseav" from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and draw two cards.

name: Electric Essence, Systico
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player's rear-guard was returned to hand this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, you may put a normal unit from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck. If you put a grade 3 or greater unit, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and that unit cannot [Stand] during your opponent's next stand phase.

name: Special Message, Ourora
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Heart Fragrance, Liesche
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is "Clear Appeal, Seredy", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose two normal units from your drop zone, and if they have the same card name, return them to hand. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Popple Empathy, Bettie
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, reveal seven cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, put up to one card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you put a card, put up to one of the revealed cards into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Distinguished Wink, Radka
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, draw a card.
[ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], look at two cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, and put one card from among them into your drop zone. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Bermuda Triangle Cadet, Shizuku
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Happiness Heart, Lupina
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one normal unit from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called, get an Imaginary Gift:Force, and put that marker on the (RC) that unit is on.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] all of your rear-guards on circles with a Force marker.

effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, choose up to five of your rear-guards. If all of the chosen rear-guards have different card names, [Stand] all of them. If you [Stand] three or more rear-guards, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.

effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of normal units on any player's (RC), and return them to hand. Activate all of the effects below according to the number of cards returned.
・2 or more - This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・3 or more - Get an Imaginary Gift:Force.
・4 or more - Search your deck for up to one unit card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

effect:

[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a rear-guard with [Melody] into your soul], draw a card, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you get an Imaginary Gift:Force, Accel, or Protect.

name: Happiness Heart, Lupina
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one normal unit from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called, get an Imaginary Gift:Force, and put that marker on the (RC) that unit is on.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] all of your rear-guards on circles with a Force marker.

name: Perfect Performance, Ange
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of normal units on any player's (RC), and return them to hand. Activate all of the effects below according to the number of cards returned.
・2 or more - This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・3 or more - Get an Imaginary Gift:Force.
・4 or more - Search your deck for up to one unit card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: PR♥ISM-Image, Vert
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and bind a card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your (RC) or drop zone. If you bound a card, this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return all of your front row rear-guards to your hand], and call up to one card with "PR♥ISM" in its card name from your bind zone to (RC). If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you may call up to a total of two cards with "PR♥ISM" in their different card names to (RC) instead of one.

name: Chouchou Debut Stage, Tirua
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, choose any number of normal units on any player's (RC), and return them to hand. If three or more cards were returned, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it attacked, if three or more of any player's rear-guards were returned to hand this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Sweetest Sister, Meer
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, put a Meer's Present marker into your hand.
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, reveal any number of "Meer's Present" from your hand, and all of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card revealed. If you revealed two or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and heal a card from your damage zone.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, call up to one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Clear Appeal, Seredy
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your units, search your deck or drop zone for up to one card with the same card name as that unit, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard attacks, reveal any number of cards from your hand with the same card name as the attacking unit, and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each card revealed.

name: Velvet Voice, Raindear
effect:
[CONT](Deck):While it is revealed by a card's effect, it is regarded as a trigger unit instead of a normal unit.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], reveal ten cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, ride up to one of the revealed cards not named "Velvet Voice, Raindear" as [Stand], shuffle your deck, and that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn. At the end of this turn, put that unit on the bottom of your deck, and ride a grade 3 card from your soul as [Rest].

name: Meer's Present
effect: (This represents Meer's Present, and cannot be put in a deck. This card cannot be normal called, and will be erased if superior called.)
